categories.name: Fun parties
categories.description: Apr√®s-ski parties, snow festivals, and mountain night events full of fun and energy.

categories.name: Sporting events
categories.description: Take part in thrilling competitions and test your skills on the resort's top slopes. The program includes races, tournaments, and marathons.

categories.name: Family programs
categories.description: Family-friendly winter adventures, safe slopes, and fun snow activities for all ages.

products.name: Alpine Pro X1
products.description: The Alpine Pro X1 is designed for advanced skiers who demand precision and control. With its lightweight construction and responsive edge grip, this ski excels on groomed runs and hard-packed snow. Perfect for carving turns with confidence.

products.name: Powder Master
products.description: Float effortlessly through deep powder with the K2 Powder Master. Its wide profile and rocker design provide exceptional flotation in soft snow conditions. Ideal for off-piste adventures and backcountry exploration.

products.name: Freestyle Elite
products.description: Take your park riding to the next level with the Burton Freestyle Elite. This board features a true twin shape and soft flex for maximum versatility. Perfect for jibbing, spinning, and hitting jumps with style and ease.

products.name: Carver Pro
products.description: Experience precision carving with the Atomic Carver Pro. Built for speed and stability, these skis feature a narrow waist and aggressive sidecut. Ideal for intermediate to advanced skiers who love making clean, powerful turns.

products.name: Mountain Beast
products.description: Conquer any terrain with the Salomon Mountain Beast. These all-mountain skis handle everything from groomed runs to powder fields with ease. Durable construction and versatile performance make them perfect for adventurous skiers.

products.name: Snow Shredder
products.description: The Burton Snow Shredder is built for aggressive all-mountain riding. With its directional shape and medium-stiff flex, this board delivers power and precision in varied conditions. Great for riders who want one board for everything.

products.name: Race Demon
products.description: Built for speed demons and racing enthusiasts, the Head Race Demon offers unmatched edge hold and stability at high speeds. Its race-inspired design and stiff flex make it perfect for aggressive carving and GS turns.

products.name: Park Rider
products.description: The Ride Park Rider is your ticket to park domination. With its playful flex and true twin shape, this board makes learning tricks and hitting features fun and forgiving. Perfect for beginners to intermediate park riders.

products.name: All-Mountain X
products.description: The K2 All-Mountain X is the ultimate versatile ski for riders who want to explore the entire mountain. Balanced performance across all conditions, from groomers to powder to moguls. An excellent choice for intermediate skiers.

products.name: Freeride Pro
products.description: The Rossignol Freeride Pro is engineered for expert skiers seeking ultimate performance in variable terrain. Wide underfoot with powerful edge control, these skis handle steep chutes, deep snow, and technical descents with confidence.

products.name: Backcountry Beast
products.description: Venture into the backcountry with the Jones Backcountry Beast. This splitboard-ready design features a directional shape optimized for powder and touring. Built tough for remote adventures and deep snow exploration.

products.name: Speed Demon
products.description: The Atomic Speed Demon lives up to its name with lightning-fast performance on groomed runs. Its lightweight design and quick turn initiation make it perfect for intermediate skiers looking to improve their technique and speed.
